participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, loves to explore new things.
participant_1.background: i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i'm four years old.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Driven and caring, always supportive of her family and friends.
participant_2.background: i am married to a doctor. my family is continuously growing. i am a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.
